General.Name: WINIADIMCHAE Co.Ltd
General.Description: WINIA Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells home appliances in Korea and internationally. It offers kitchen appliances, such as refrigerators, cookers, freezers, oven, microwave, electric stove, dish washer, water purifier, electric kettle, and air fryer; household appliances, that include washing machines, dryers, TV, and massagers; air appliance, such as air conditioning systems, air cleaners, dehumidifiers, air washer humidifiers, and spoiler under the Winia, dimchae, Dimchae Cook, and classe brand names. The company was formerly known as WINIADIMCHAE Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to WINIA Co., Ltd. in March 2022. WINIA Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Gwangju-si, South Korea.
